ygData.subject: Re: From Casters Realm...
ygData.msgSnippet: So I guess the fact that supposedly not one piece has been found since the PoH patch by anyone on any of the servers is just some odd coincidence of the random
ygData.messageBody:
So I guess the fact that supposedly not one piece has been found since
the PoH patch by anyone on any of the servers is just some odd
coincidence of the random generator.

On Tue, Nov 30/99, Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...> wrote:
> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> BARDIC PLANE ARMOR
> I just double checked with the dev team to try and resolve this and have
> been informed they have extensively tested this and the Bard armor is
> dropping on public servers.
>
> Guess it's just ultra rare. At least Maestro always has a prsent for them.
>
